sentences.sContent: ...What does the woman imply about the low price television sets...
...What does the author imply about books on success so far...
...What does the author imply about robotics...
...What does the man imply about Larry and his roommate...
...A 100 need not imply that there is no possibility of improvement...
...What does the woman imply about the man’s glasses...

remMethod.val: im(进入) ＋ ply(重叠) → 重叠表达 → 暗示， 意指

trans.tranOther: to suggest that something is true, without saying this directly
